Question.Subject: How to Make Successful Weblog like ByteChip. TechCrunch?
Question.Content:
I have been navigating around websites like Tech Crunch, Mashable and http://www.ByteChip.com .
Im wondering what should I do to create such popular blogs like those. I presently hold a blogspotaccount and get 200 visitors a day. Can you guys help me? I
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes, you can make a successful weblog Peril. If u make a Post of fine Tutorials and Good Reviews to your site. Avoid flash things to your site theme.

Answer.Content: Yes, you can make a successful weblog Peril. If u make a Post of fine Tutorials and Good Reviews to your site. Avoid flash things to your site theme.
